divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my patio when I saw a peculiar bright light resembling a star yet it was too low to be one. At first I thought it was a star but then I noticed it was moving at a steady pace. I felt a sense of urgency to take a picture of the object since this wasn't the first time I've witness a strange sighting like this. However, I've learned to always bring my camera and keep it powered on. I felt a sense of excitement after seeing the object. I lost sight of the object shortly as after taking the picture. What really surprised me is what I saw when I reviewed the photo. I didn't use the flash being that I didn't want to drown out the brightness of the object.
Summary: I was sitting on my patio when I saw a peculiar bright light. I had just enough time to snap on picture using my Cannon digital camera without the flash and what I saw surprised me.
